about_the_game:
In a quaint midwestern town in 1987, a cultist group has been performing dark rituals and is trying to set off the end of the world as we know it. Now they have opened the Tears, and the Invasion has begun! It’s up to you and your band of friends to clean up the mess. One small catch: not everyone on your team can be trusted. One of you will turn against the rest and try to stop you!

  • Cooperative Multiplayer with Betrayal! Work with (or against) a team of up to four players and save the world from interdimensional horrors. But beware, dark powers will corrupt one of your friends.
  • Get to crafting! Nothing is plentiful; you’ll have to be resourceful, craft items needed for the ritual, or survive!
  • Randomized rituals! Ritual objectives get randomized each round along with side rituals that can help or hinder the team.
  • Procedurally generated and randomized environments will keep you guessing and wondering what horrors lurk around every turn.
  • Alter reality! Using the sigil system, players can modify gameplay to their liking or let it be their worst nightmare.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains some blood and gore as well as violence.

short_description: The Grip of Madness is a multiplayer cooperative FPS where your teammates can betray you at any time. Shoot your way through hordes of monsters, gather clues, and complete the ritual to stop their invasion.
